allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor MCPE as MCP SDK extension

This is a major architectural change that refactors MCPE from a standalone
implementation to a proper extension of the official MCP SDK.

Key changes:
- Add new @anthropic/mcpe package that wraps McpServer/Client
- EventsServer registers MCP tools for subscription management
- Events delivered via MCP notifications instead of custom JSON-RPC
- Update agent-server to use new @anthropic/mcpe package
- Add basic-server and basic-client examples

The new design reduces code complexity by leveraging the MCP SDK''s
transport, JSON-RPC, and protocol handling while keeping our domain
types \(events, subscriptions, filters\) as the value-add.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Update Dockerfile for @mcpe/core package structure

- Reference packages/mcpe instead of packages/core and packages/client
- Update build command to use @mcpe/core filter
- Copy fly.toml to root for easier deployment

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Wire up agent handler with OpenAI for event processing

- Add onAgentHandler callback to EventsServer configuration
- Agent handler invokes OpenAI \(gpt-4o-mini\) with event data
- Uses systemPrompt, instructions, model, maxTokens from handler config
- Sends agent responses to ntfy.sh for visibility

New demo subscriptions:
- error.* events: Incident response agent analyzes errors
- analyze.* events: Data analyst agent extracts insights

New endpoints:
- POST /publish/error: Trigger error analysis agent
- POST /publish/analyze: Trigger data analysis agent

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
